content: the baby sizes of this cute turban style hat have been so popular so i thought you would also enjoy bigger sizes too each hat requires dk yarn 35 - 45g of acrylic dk depending on the size you make 4mm needles add a pretty flower or a big button if desired this design is available in smaller sizes too - medium preemie large preemie 0 - 3 months 3 - 6 months 6 - 9 months and 9 - 12 months so cute **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
